mapper.sql: c.content_brand_id AS contentBrandId, c.content_id AS contentId, c.brand_id AS brandId, c.brand_name AS brandName, c.description, c.create_by AS "createBy.userId", c.create_date AS createDate, c.update_by AS "updateBy.userId", c.update_date AS updateDate
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO content_brand(content_brand_id, content_id, brand_id, brand_name, description, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date) VALUES(#{contentBrandId}, #{contentId}, #{brandId}, #{brandName}, #{description}, #{createBy.userId}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.userId}, #{updateDate})
mapper.update: UPDATE content_brand SET brand_id = #{brandId}, brand_name = #{brandName}, description = #{description}, update_by = #{updateBy.userId}, update_date = #{updateDate} WHERE content_id = #{contentId}
